BLACKSQUARE2.TITLE: Black Square 2
BLACKSQUARE2.DESCRIPTION: A quiz game, and more. Named after the hardest version of the DJMAX Portable series, this game will take you through 200 different questions with varying difficulty.

BLACKSQUAREOR.TITLE: Black Square: Original
BLACKSQUAREOR.DESCRIPTION: The original Black Square quiz game coded in C++ will now rock your VB.NET world. And you thought quiz games are easy.
